name: TWAIN
description:
In this game, you control two triangles who can never be too far apart.

W and S push or pull you two together,

A and D rotate

Toggle which of the two triangles' position is locked

Both triangles can lock in white zones

Green triangle can lock in the green zone.

Pink triangle can lock in the pink zone.

Warning this game is somewhat disorienting. If you suffer from motion sickness, feel free to press "r" to fix the camera.

Have fun!

Source code available: https://github.com/JR-Morgan/Twain

Game is made with unity and uses the following third party assets

Background image:  https://images.nasa.gov/details-PIA12348

Royalty Free Music from Bensound
